articles.title: Priyanka Chopra leads the worst dressed stars at the Fashion Awards - Daily Mail
articles.description: Actress Priyanka Chopra, 39, lead the stars who didn't get the stylish memo in a garish catsuit on the red carpet as she was joined by her husband Nick Jonas, 29 at the Royal Albert Hall.
articles.content:
It's a night to celebrate the best dressed in the business and awards the suave and stylish.
But that didn't stop some of fashion's top stars missing the mark last night at the Fashion Awards.
